嵱字的基本解释

嵱
yǒng
〔嵱嵷（
s弉g ）〕山峰众多起伏的样子，如“陵高衍之嵱嵱兮。”

嵱字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yóng］
［《廣韻》餘封切，平鍾，以。］
山名。
[②]［yǒng］
［《集韻》尹竦切，上腫，以。］
见“嵱2嵷”。

嵱字的康熙字典解释

【寅集中】【山字部】　嵱； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页317第44
【廣韻】【集韻】?餘封切，音容。山名。【楊愼曰】在容州，山下有鬼市。　又【集韻】尹竦切，音湧。嵱嵷，山峰貌。【揚雄·甘泉賦】陵高衍之嵱嵷。【註】上下衆多貌。

嵱字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
嵱字的起名意思

指山峰众多起伏的样子。

嵱
Basic explanation of words
嵱
yǒng
〔嵱嵷(
s弉g)] There are many ups and downs of the mountain peaks, such as "Ling Gaoyan Zhixiexi."
嵱
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yóng］
["Guangyun" Yu Fengqie, Pingzhong, to. ]
Mountain name.
[②]［yǒng］
["Ji Yun" Yin Qi cut, swollen on the top, to. ]
See "嵱2嵷".
嵱
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Yin Collection] [Mountain Character Department] 　嵱; Kangxi Strokes: 13; Page Number: Page 317 44
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Yu Fengqie, voice volume. Mountain name. [Yang Ming said] In Rongzhou, there is a ghost city under the mountain.　[Jiyun] Yin Ling cut, and the sound surged. Weimei, the appearance of the peaks. 【Yangxiong·Ganquan Fu】Ling Gaoyanzhi Weimei. [Note] There are many appearances from top to bottom.
嵱

Taiwan Minutes
Hong Kong Mingti
Korean Ming Dynasty
嵱
Name meaning
Refers to the many ups and downs of the mountain.
yǒng, yóng
